content: Just a heads up in case anyone notices logs related to decoding lighthouse enrs, we've made a PR to fix the bug, and should be merged in the next day

author: jimmygchen
content: The impact with mismatching enr format is LH will only recognise LH peers as supernodes and same for other other clients (they'll see LH supernodes as regular nodes)

author: jimmygchen
content: We can wait for a bit. I guess rolling this out to a LH supernode means one less supernode for LH nodes, and one more supernodes for other client nodes ðŸ˜‚
